mapper.select: SELECT id, name, workspace_id, api_total, api_p0, api_test_total, api_test_p0, scenario_test_total from tuhu_okr;
mapper.insert: insert into tuhu_okr (id, name, description, create_time, update_time, workspace_id, api_total, api_p0, api_test_total, api_test_p0, scenario_test_total) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{create_time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{update_time,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{workspace_id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customNum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{stepModel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{prerequisite,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{api_total,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{api_p0,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{api_test_total,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{api_test_p0,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{scenario_test_total,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
